Class DAOappointments

java.lang.Object
DBDatabase.DAOappointments
public class DAOappointments extends Object
this method connects to JDBC and access the 'appointments' table

  • Method Details

    • getDataAppointment

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getDataAppointment() throws SQLException
      this method makes a connection to db, creates an observable list for appointments, will get all appointments from the table, then will return the table
      Returns:
      list This will return a list of appointments to the appointmentController and will be displayed for the user to see
      Throws:
      SQLException - this is the sql exception

    • insert

      public static int insert(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, Integer customerID, Integer userID, Integer contactID) throws SQLException
      this method will get data entered by the user and insert it into the appointment table
      Parameters:
      title - this is the title of the appointment
      description - this is a description of the kind of appointment
      location - this is the location of the appointment
      type - this is the type of appointment
      start - this is the start time and date of the appointment
      end - this is the end time and date of the appointment
      customerID - this is the customer identification number
      userID - this is the user identification number that identifies who the user is
      contactID - this is the customers' contact identification number that can be used to get the customers contact from the contact table
      Returns:
      rowsaffected this will return the rows that were affected
      Throws:
      SQLException - this is the sql exception

    • update

      public static void update(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, Integer customerID, Integer userID, Integer contactID, Integer appointment) throws SQLException
      this method will update an appointment after the user selects an appointment row from the appointmentController
      Parameters:
      customerID - this is the customer identification number
      contactID - this is the customers' contact identification number that can be used to get the customers contact * from the contact table
      description - this is a description of the kind of appointment
      end - this is the end time and date of the appointment
      start - this is the start time and date of the appointment
      location - this is the location of the appointment
      title - this is the title of the appointment
      type - this is the type of appointment
      userID - this is the user identification number that identifies who the user is
      appointment - this is the appointment identificaiton number that will help identify what appointment is being updated and will impliment those changes
      Throws:
      SQLException - this is the sql exception

    • delete

      public static int delete(int appointmentID) throws SQLException
      this method will delete the selected appointment from the appointment table in appointmentController
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - this number will be used to find the appointment in the appointment table in db and delete it
      Returns:
      this will return the rows affected
      Throws:
      SQLException - this is the sql exception

    • deleteCustomerAppointment

      public static int deleteCustomerAppointment(int customerID) throws SQLException
      this method will occur when a user wishes to delete a customer from the customer table this method will delete any appointments that are associated with the deleted customer
      Parameters:
      customerID - this will be used to find appointments that have the customer id
      Returns:
      this will return the rows affected, else will return null
      Throws:
      SQLException - this is the sql exception

    • getAppointmentsByCustomerID

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByCustomerID(int customerID) throws SQLException
      this method will get all rows with a specific customerID and return all the rows
      Parameters:
      customerID - this is the customer identification number
      Returns:
      this will return an observable list of appointments or will return null if there are no appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException - this is the sql exception

    • getMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getMonth(int month) throws SQLException
      this method will return a list of appointment objects with a matching number of the month (ex: January = 1, May= 5)
      Parameters:
      month - this get the number that represents the month
      Returns:
      this will return the list of appointment objects that have mathcing months
      Throws:
      SQLException - this is the sql exception

    • getAppointmentCount

      public static int getAppointmentCount(Integer monthNum, String appointmentType, int count) throws SQLException
      this method will return the total number of appointments if the appointment has a matching Month and appointment type from the input.
      Parameters:
      appointmentType - this is the type of appointment that is passed into method
      monthNum - this is the number that represents a month (ex: Jan = 1, May = 5, Dec = 12)
      count - this is the total number of appointments that will continuosly be passed into this method until there are no more matching appointments
      Returns:
      count this will return the total appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException - this is the sql exception
